attributes.action: Appeal to uk supreme courts ruling on gender identity
attributes.additional_details: Millions of transgender people now feel unsafe and will have more discrimination brought towards them.
attributes.background: Appeal to supreme court to change the ruling of what they identify sex or gender

rejection.details:
The Government and UK Parliament cannot appeal a Supreme Court decision, so we're not sure what action you would like.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the Equality Act to be amended to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223
